name: HoT Kill
description:
Get yourself a spot for your weekly <:heartofthorns:1162356811526053938> **Heart of Thorns** (wings 1-4) clear.

<:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- **Tank**
  - Tank on <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian**.
  - Tank on <:gorseval:703930783198347284> **Gorseval**.
  - Tank on <:keepconstruct:703930783223644200> **Keep Construct**.
  - Tank on <:xera:703930902069117008> **Xera**.
  - Tank on <:mursaat:703930783680954459> **Mursaat Overseer** (Claim).
  - Tank on <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**.
- **Kiter @ Sabetha**
  - Kite the `Flak` on <:sabetha:703930783320113192> **Sabetha**.
- **Glenna's Escort @ Escort**
  - Escort Glenna through the encounter and keep her alive

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS Roles:**
- **Condi @ VG**
  - Come with a condi DPS specifically for <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian**'s `Red Guardian`.
- **Cannons @ Sabetha**
  - Take cannon 1 (1-3) or cannon 2 (2-4) on <:sabetha:703930783320113192> **Sabetha**.
- **Handkiter @ Deimos**
  - Come with a hand-kiter build for <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos**.
- **Mushroom @ <:slothasor:703930783206998087> Slothasor**
  - Take one of the Mushrooms @ <:slothasor:703930783206998087> **Slothasor**.

<:contacts:1163765170829525024> **Roles Anyone but Healers Can Choose:**
- **Mortars @ Bandit Trio**
  - Deal with the mortars that spwan
- **Saboteurs @ Bandit Trio**
  - Deal with the saboteurs that spawn
- **Oils @ Bandit Trio**
  - Throw the Oil Kegs at Narella
- **Backwarg @ Escort**
  - Deal with the Backwarg

<:contacts:1163765170829525024> **Roles Anyone Can Choose:**
- **Stability @ <:slothasor:703930783206998087> Slothasor**
  - Negate the <:fear:715162058802593872> **Fear** on <:slothasor:703930783206998087> **Slothasor**.
- **Reflect @ Matt**
  - Bring some kind of projectile reflection for <:matthias:703930783311593563> **Matthias**.
- **Skip Button @ Twisted Castle**
  - Do the `skip button` @ Twisted Castle.
- **Fountain Button @ Twisted Castle**
  - Do the `fountain button` @ Twisted Castle.
- **Triple Button @ Twisted Castle**
  - Do the `triple button` @ Twisted Castle.
- **Towers @ Escort**
  - Come with a <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Mesmer** build to handle the `Towers` mechanic on <:escort:841311758147911742> **Escort**. If you want to take some DPS players with you and do towers as a Team you can do that too, just let me know before the encounter.
- **Push / Immob**
  - Perform `Seeker Control` on <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian**.
  - Push the `Construct Core` on <:keepconstruct:703930783223644200> **Keep Construct**.
  - Push/CC `Rigom` at <:samarog:703930783257329714> **Samarog**.
- **Dispel @ Mursaat Overseer**
  - Do the dispel mechanic at Murssat Overseer
- **Protect @ Mursaat Overseer**
  - Do the protect mechanic a Mursaat Overseer
- **Green @ VG**
  - Get the green guardian and pull it to the blue one


Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: Template for a full HoT run
